ygData.subject: Old Euridan and Elder Elvish learning
ygData.msgSnippet: Please tell me if there is truth to this: I want to improve my Old Euridan language skill.  I plan on traveling to Euridan and hanging out with the NPC s there
ygData.messageBody:
Please tell me if there is truth to this:

I want to improve my Old Euridan language skill. I plan on traveling to
Euridan and hanging out with the NPC's there in the wizards guild. I plan
on sitting down next to some of them. Should this improve my skill?

I noticed I have Elder Elvish as a skill now (maybe because I used to hang
out in my hometown of Felwithe allot and just picked it up) I do not want
to spend another training point in Old Euridan or any language for that
fact. I also do not want to have someone SPAM to me anymore unless I pay
them to SPAM me ...and me alone (not fair to others in my group).

- Ziffnab of Xegony

17th Wizard
